body: A 15-foot burst of corrosive liquid sprays out of the modified construct's stash. Creatures within the burst must succeed on a DC 15 Fortitude saving throw or take 2d6 points of acid damage and be nauseated for 1d4 rounds. On a successful save, the afflicted creature takes no damage but is sickened for 1 round.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Construct Modifications/Shatter Stash/Corrosive Jet Stash
name: Corrosive Jet Stash
